entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 04:15 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: N 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries in onshore winds. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 03:25 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries in onshore winds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 03:25 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Overcast. Low minus 15 except minus 19 inland.
entry.summary: Overcast. 40 percent chance of flurries in onshore winds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15 except minus 19 inland. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 03:25 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
